item.title: On the competitiveness impact of the EU CBAM: An Input-Output approach
item.description: Abstract While many countries seek to set a price for carbon emissions, significant price dispersion and relative stringency keep raising concerns on carbon leakage. We quantify the competitiveness impact of the EU CBAM based on the multi-regional Input-Output approach.
